Groestlcoin Samourai Testnet Wallet
About Groestlcoin Samourai Testnet Wallet
Remove Groestlcoin Samourai Testnet from the Android launcher and home screen. You must dial **YOUR_PIN_CODE# from the phone dialer to launch Groestlcoin Samourai.
Are you sure you want to exit Groestlcoin SamouraiTestnet ?
Your Groestlcoin Samourai Testnet Wallet device now has a different SIM card corresponding to incoming number of this text message.
Groestlcoin Samourai Testnet does not handle transactions over 100KB in size. Please try splitting your transaction.
This is your Shifted Account. The Groestlcoin you receive through ShapeShift will be stored in this account which does not share the same address space as your primary wallet account.
Groestlcoin Samourai Testnet Wallet cannot be run on this device
Groestlcoin Samourai Testnet is routing via Tor.
Groestlcoin Samourai Testnet is not routing via Tor. Tap to activate.
Tap to install Orbot and route Groestlcoin Samourai Testnet through Tor.
(includes 0.002 tGRS fee to Groestlcoin Samourai Testnet and miners\' fees)?
Trusted node is set. Note that Groestlcoin Samourai Testnet Wallet supports Groestlcoin Core 2.13.1 and over.
I understand that Groestlcoin Samourai Testnet cannot provide assistance in the case of lost or forgotten passphrases. Samourai never has any knowledge of my passphrase.
import an encrypted groestlcoin samourai testnet backup to restore a wallet with all meta-data intact
Groestlcoin Samourai Testnet Wallet is in offline mode.
Port (17766 Standard)
